text: <@UATE4ATHP> would you be able to submit a ticket to support and then send me the ticket ID? I can follow it internally on my end and see whats going on.
Thank you for helping to get this resolved so quickly!
Anytime! thanks again for pinging me on it :slightly_smiling_face:

Hi all, I'm creating a module that have a graphql file associated with it, the thing is that the graphql have two querys and I'm not being able to access the information of the second one. For the first one I just use module.data_query.data, but what about the second one? is it possible to have two querys in a single file? thanks

Hi,I am working on an unsubscribe page, does anyone know the best way to test the @HubSpot/email_simple_subscription module so that I can style it as if it they received an actual link from an email? The unsubscribe page currently has an input field when I view it in preview- I don't want it to have this and want it to display the email in a non input tag. I already have a live unsubscribe site that is different from the new unsubscribe site. Thanks
